knimeNode.name: PDB Connector Queries To Table
knimeNode.shortDescription: Converts one or more queries to a table

fullDescription.intro:
This node converts one or more RCSB PDB advanced query definitions to a table, such that it can e.g. be stored in a database
This node was developed by Vernalis Research (Cambridge, UK) . For feedback and more information, please contact knime@vernalis.com
